articles.author: Louis Casiano
articles.title: Polish leader warns of 'prewar era,' urges European nations to invest in defense - Fox News
articles.description: Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk said European nations need to invest in defense in the face of Russian aggression against Ukraine
